title: Parabolic Discussion with Mark Lefebvre and Manuel Post
description:
Mark Lefebvre and Manuel Post are leaders on the Awakening from the Meaning Crisis Discord and the YouTube channel of the same name. They arrived separately from myself at the idea that John Vervaeke's four ways of knowing might be incomplete. After seeing my videos on parabolic knowledge, they reached out to me for a conversation and we had a blast.

John Vervaeke Q&A Discussion on the Awakening from the Meaning Crisis Discord channel here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2BiheMJxAcA

My video proposing Parabolic knowledge:Encountering the Personal God pt 3: How Parabolic Knowledge Collapses Explosive Comparisons: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8wvDPfR_QWo&list=PLPDXZ3FC6Ie2Vv429VuPu0SS7JalS4r77&index=9

My conversation with John Vervaeke about parabolic knowledge: Kinds of knowing and humans as mediators w/ Mary Kochan - Voices with Vervaeke: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=muGtDZePSlE&list=PLPDXZ3FC6Ie2Vv429VuPu0SS7JalS4r77&index=11

My "ladder" video referenced in this video: Awe, Wonder, Delight, and What is Relevant to a Chicken Anyway?: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVrMaWDgqAg 

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
Introduction to Christianity: https://amzn.to/2A5pvZi
Pope Benedict XVI writings:  https://w2.vatican.va/content/benedict-xvi/en.html 
Paul VanderKlay’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg 
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis (John Vervaeke): https://youtu.be/54l8_ewcOlY
John V. and PVK in conversation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=65CcfvXXHug
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqinRbjqy2c
Randos United: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEzWTLDYmL8soRdQec9Fsjw 
Me on Paul's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5q_5mVArNI
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
Karen Wong's channel, The Meaning Code: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ
Sevilla King's channel, A Quality Existence: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6vg0HkKKlgsWk-3HfV-vnw  
Jonathon Pageau's channel, The Symbolic World: https://www.youtube.com/user/pageaujonathan/videos
